{{also|来而不往非礼也}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=来而不往非礼也}}

===Etymology===
From the ''[[w:Book of Rites|Book of Rites]]''
: Literally: To come then not go is not polite.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=lái ér bù wǎng fēi lǐ yě
|cat=prov
}}

===Proverb===
{{zh-proverb}}

# It is impolite not to reciprocate; Friendship cannot stand always on one side; It's impolite not to make a return for what one receives; One should return as good as one receives.
